name: NSCC Jam 2019: Step Ahead
description: For 2019's NSCC jam I worked with 2 artists and 3 other programmers to create a mini game collection. The theme was "Aesthetically Pleasing" so we each tried to make mini games based on what we thought looked cool for a game. The best part of the game is that it is entirely dance pad compatible and was built with dance pad controls in mind.
